nodes.text: Captain Krempil of the Malarian Alliance was a male officer. In 33 BBY, a patrol cruiser was captained by Krempil and assigned two Jedi observers, Dooku and Ring-Sol Ambase, to hunt Hethra Mcgrrrr's pirate gang.
They had been tracking the Random Mallet for three days when they cornered it in a nebula, although the pirate ship escaped. Dooku considered the officer to be a coward and a fool.
Krempil appears in Ryder Windham's yoing readers novel The Clone Wars: Secret Missions 4: Guardians of the Chiss Key.
